text: Carmen Antimo Argenziano (October 27, 1943 â€“ February 10, 2019) was an American actor. He was best known for playing Jacob Carter on Stargate SG-1. Argenziano also starred on Booker, L.A. Law, Melrose Place, and The Young and the Restless. He had a small role in The Godfather Part II and The Accused. Argenziano died on February 10, 2019 in Los Angeles at the age of 75. ==References== ==Other websites== * * *Selmak.Org ~ Unofficial Fan Site Category:1943 births Category:2019 deaths Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from Pennsylvania
title: Carmen Argenziano
